plot: Evan, a reticent young man, and his two best friends must search through their forgotten memories to find their place of eternal solace in the afterlife.
title: This Solace Eternal
plot_es: Evan, a reticent young man, and his two best friends must search through their forgotten memories to find their place of eternal solace in the afterlife.
plot_en: Evan, a reticent young man, and his two best friends must search through their forgotten memories to find their place of eternal solace in the afterlife.
